import React from 'react' import Baskets from './Baskets'; import utils from '../utils' import '../css/checkout.css'; import BillingAddress from './BillingAddress'; import Payment from './Payment'; import useProducts from './useProducts'; import Paypal from './Paypal'; function Checkout(props) { const {submitAddress,saveAddress,billAddress} = useProducts(); return (
Subtotal
{utils.formatCurrency(props.cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a + c.price * c.count,0))}
Tax
{utils.formatCurrency(props.cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a + c.price * c.count,0)* 0.18) }
Total
{utils.formatCurrency(props.cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a + c.price * c.count,0) + props.cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a + c.price * c.count,0)* 0.18) }
) } export default Checkout
